SENT.plain: We report a case of a 27-year-old man who presented with an acute myocardial infarction
When he was hospitalized one month later to evaluate this recent event, he developed clinical findings consistent with the diagnosis of Adamantiadis-BehÃ§et's syndrome
We believe that the myocardial infarction was due to coronary arteritis, because there were no risk factors for coronary disease present
